Description:
A Superbly Spacious Surprise!
Step inside to uncover the surprise! Deceptively spacious inside and boasting an expansive deck capable of holding the largest gatherings, this stylish single level home is a real surprise package. Equally appealing to busy families and downsizers looking for reduced maintenance, the home holds a prized position closer Ormond station & shops and within easy reach of buses & quality schools.
Beyond the gated front garden, the accommodation unfurls to give a clue of the fine spaces within. Life here is focused around the rear stone kitchen which has been equipped with a high-end Miele dishwasher and Bosch oven/cooktop - with loads of storage and a breakfast island, this is the perfect place to host family and friends. Filled with natural light, the spacious living and dining zone showcases large glass doors which open to connect indoors with the fabulous deck and a surprisingly large side yard.

A full laundry is also offered along with an auto garage with secure internal entry, whilst an alarm, ducted heating/cooling and vacuum complete a brilliant package.
